games.name: Age of Empires IV
games.description: A real-time strategy game where players build civilizations, gather resources, and wage war across historical eras.
tasks: Win a skirmish match against AI
Play a full match with a new civilization

games.name: Age of Mythology: Retold
games.description: A remastered version of the classic myth-based RTS, letting players control gods, myth units, and civilizations.
tasks: Summon and use a myth unit in battle
Win a skirmish match against AI
Use a god power to turn the tide of a fight

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A social deduction game where players work together to complete tasks while impostors secretly sabotage them.
tasks: Complete all assigned tasks in one match
Play one full round without being eliminated

games.name: Anno 1404
games.description: A city-building and economic strategy game where players manage settlements, trade, and diplomatic relations in the medieval era.
tasks: Set up a profitable trade route
Complete one scenario or quest chain

games.name: Brawlhalla
games.description: A free-to-play platform fighting game featuring a variety of characters, weapons, and online multiplayer battles.
tasks: Win a match with a new legend
Play three matches in a row

games.name: Counter-Strike 2
games.description: The next iteration of the classic tactical first-person shooter, emphasizing team-based gameplay and bomb-defusal missions.
tasks: Get at least one headshot kill
Plant or defuse the bomb successfully
Finish a match with positive K/D
Play a full match without leaving

games.name: Factorio
games.description: A factory-building game where players automate production lines, research technologies, and defend against alien attacks.
tasks: Automate the production of a new item
Expand the factory into a new area
Improve efficiency of an existing production line

games.name: Lethal Company
games.description: A co-op horror-survival game where players work together to complete objectives while avoiding deadly threats.
tasks: Escape with at least one teammate alive

games.name: Sea of Thieves
games.description: An open-world pirate adventure game focused on sailing, treasure hunting, and multiplayer naval combat.
tasks: Turn in treasure at an outpost
Survive a skeleton or sea monster encounter

games.name: Slime Rancher
games.description: A farming simulation game where players collect, feed, and manage cute slimes on a distant planet.
tasks: Earn a set amount of newbucks

games.name: Stellaris
games.description: A grand strategy game set in space, focusing on exploration, empire management, and interstellar diplomacy.

games.name: Terraria
games.description: A sandbox adventure game blending exploration, crafting, and combat in a procedurally generated 2D world.
tasks: Craft a powerful weapon or tool

games.name: Portal 2
games.description: A puzzle-platform game where players solve physics-based puzzles using a portal gun in a humorous narrative.
tasks: Solve a puzzle using new mechanics

games.name: R.E.P.O.
games.description: A roguelike action game where players navigate procedural levels, defeat enemies, and manage limited resources.

games.name: Omori
games.description: A psychological RPG following a boy named Omori as he explores surreal worlds, battles enemies, and uncovers hidden memories.
tasks: Explore a new area or world
Interact with at least one hidden character or secret

games.name: Need for Speed: Heat
games.description: An open-world racing game where players compete in street races by day and evade police by night in the city of Palm City.
